text: Nenets Autonomous Okrug is a Russian federal subject. The titular ethnic group are the Nenets. Their traditional music includes epic poems comparable to the Finnish Kalevala and the Yakut Olonkho. Traditional Nenets music includes the use of neither musical instruments nor dance. The annual Mimi-Nor festival is an important part of modern Nenets music. ==References== ==External links== *Report on Nenets music *PDF report on Forest Nenets music Category:Nenets Autonomous Okrug Nenets Autonomous Okrug Category:Arctic music Category:Indigenous music
title: Music in Nenets Autonomous Okrug
